00024 // the CAVSystem class --------------------------------------------------------+
00025 enum BlockType { btPoint, btBox, btPyramid, btCylinder };
00026 enum ColorType { ctNormal, ctMarked, ctHighlighted };
00027 
00028 class CAVSystem {
00029 public:
00030         CAVSystem();
00031         ~CAVSystem();
00032 
00033         void SetDiagramBlockInfo(BlockType bType, const VECTOR3D &vCol, const VECTOR3D &vColMarked, 
00034                                      const VECTOR3D &vColHighlighted);
00035         template <class Iter> void BeginDrawing(Iter iBegin, Iter iEnd, double fMaxData, int nCount);
00036         void DrawDiagramBlock(double fValue, ColorType cType);
00037         void EndDrawing();
00038         void SetMaxSize(float fWidth, float fHeight, float fDepth) { m_vMaxSize = VECTOR3D(fWidth, fHeight, fDepth); }
00039         void SetOutlook(const VECTOR3D &vFrameCol, GLuint iFrameTex);
00040         void SetBlockType(BlockType bType) { m_bType = bType; }
00041         bool m_bHoriz;
00042         bool m_bFrame;
00043         bool m_bTextured;
00044 private:
00045         BlockType m_bType;
00046         VECTOR3D m_vCol;
00047         VECTOR3D m_vColMarked;
00048         VECTOR3D m_vColHighlighted;
00049         GLuint m_iTex;
00050         bool m_bDrawing;
00051         VECTOR3D m_vFrameCol;
00052         VECTOR3D m_vMaxSize;
00053         VECTOR3D m_vSizeAsp;
00054         int m_iLod;
00055 };
00056 
00057 // in order of error in C++ implementation I must define templated methods here:
00058 template <class Iter>
00059 void CAVSystem::BeginDrawing(Iter iBegin, Iter iEnd, double fMaxData, int nCount) {
00060         static VECTOR3D vFrame = VECTOR3D(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f);
00061         
00062         if (m_bDrawing == true) return;
00063         m_bDrawing = true;
00064 
00065         m_vSizeAsp.y = m_vMaxSize.y/(float)fMaxData;
00066         m_vSizeAsp.x = m_vMaxSize.x/(float)nCount;
00067         m_vSizeAsp.z = m_vMaxSize.z;
00068 
00069         // simple Level Of Details function:
00070         m_iLod = 6;
00071         if (nCount <= 150) m_iLod = 8;
00072         if (nCount <= 100) m_iLod = 12;
00073     if (nCount <= 50) m_iLod = 16; 
00074 
00075         glPushMatrix();
00076                 if (m_bHoriz == true) glRotatef(-90.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00077 
00078                 if (m_bFrame == true) {
00079                         if (m_bTextured) { 
00080                                 glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00081                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_iTex);
00082                         }
00083                         glColor3fv(m_vFrameCol.m);
00084                         glPushMatrix();
00085                             glTranslatef(-m_vMaxSize.x*0.5f-vFrame.x, vFrame.y+m_vMaxSize.y*0.5f, 0.0f);
00086                                 DrawBox(vFrame.x, m_vMaxSize.y+vFrame.y*1.0f, vFrame.z);
00087                                 glTranslatef(m_vMaxSize.x+vFrame.x*2.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00088                                 DrawBox(vFrame.x, m_vMaxSize.y+vFrame.y*1.0f, vFrame.z);
00089                                 
00090                                 glTranslatef(-m_vMaxSize.x*0.5f-vFrame.x, -m_vMaxSize.y*0.5f-vFrame.y, 0.0f);
00091                                 DrawBox(m_vMaxSize.x+vFrame.x*1.0f, vFrame.y, vFrame.z);
00092                                 glTranslatef(0.0f, m_vMaxSize.y+vFrame.y*2.0f, 0.0f);
00093                                 DrawBox(m_vMaxSize.x+vFrame.x*1.0f, vFrame.y, vFrame.z);
00094                         glPopMatrix();
00095                         if (m_bTextured) { glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D); }
00096                 }
00097 
00098             glTranslatef(-m_vMaxSize.x*0.5f+m_vSizeAsp.x*0.5f, vFrame.y, 0.0f);
00099 }
